title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other LLMs locally with a single command-line tool and a built-in model registry.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers to interact with the Ollama local server.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration that wraps Ollama models for chat, embeddings, and tool usage inside LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-web/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model manager, multi-user, dark mode) installable via Docker.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama providing synchronous & asynchronous APIs, streaming, and embedding support.

title: ollama-cli (go-llama)
summary: Interactive TUI for Ollama written in Go with chat history and model switching.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that uses local Ollama models for AI pair-programming suggestions.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with optional GPU support and persistent storage.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Ready-to-run Retrieval-Augmented Generation stack using Ollama, Chroma, and LangChain in Docker.

title: ollama-chatbot-ui
summary: Lightweight React chatbot frontend that connects to local Ollama instance via REST.

title: ollama-npm (npm search)
summary: Curated list of community packages on npm tagged ‘ollama’ including clients, CLI tools, and integrations.

title: ollama-pypi (PyPI search)
summary: PyPI packages tagged ‘ollama’: Python clients, LangChain adapters, and embedding utilities.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-host Discord bot that streams answers from local Ollama models with slash commands.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to summarize notes and answer questions using an Ollama backend.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack bot that answers channel questions by streaming responses from Ollama models.

title: ollama-terraform
summary: Terraform module to spin up GPU-enabled EC2 instances with Ollama pre-installed.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API with tokio.

title: ollama-django
summary: Django app with REST endpoints and admin UI to manage and query Ollama models.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat interface template that connects to Ollama with session memory and model selection.
